SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CustomUserDetailsService
CustomUserDetailsService is responsible for loading user-specific data during authentication It implements the Spring Security UserDetailsService interface which defines the method to retrieve user details based on the username provided during login CustomUserDetailsService is used to verify the existence of a user in database and provides the user's credentials and roles for authentication.
JwtAuthFilter
JWT authentication filter that validates JWT tokens for each HTTP request.
JwtService
Service for generating, parsing, and validating JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for authentication.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for Spring Security.
SuccesLoginHandler
Handles successful authentication for both standard username/password and OAuth2 logins.
SuccesLogoutHandler
Logout success handler.
